name: A Hard Maze Night
description:
For the Nokia 3310 Game Jam.

Get to the exit, collect the batteries, destroy the evil robot, do it in the dark.

Turn on the torch, remember the maze and complete the level in the dark. Get as far as you can before the batteries run out.

For keypad users:

[8] [4] [6] [2] to move

[0] to turn on your torch.

If that doesn't then arrow keys and space also works.

Made in Godot from the starter kit for the Nokia 3310 Game Jam. The font is also used from that starter pack, all other assets, music and sfx are made by me.
